channel.title: RA2 max exporter
channel.description: Does any one have an up to date version of the 3ds max plugin needed to make custom arenas and components on Robot Arena 2? The lowest version of max I have ever had was 8 and the only plugin I can find won't work with anything but 4.3, I am currently using 9...
